availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James A. Butler (Hopkins Co., KY, farmer)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Catherine Dodd Butler in Marshall County, Tennessee, on December 29, 1842. Father of Joel Butler, Susan Butler, Mary Butler, Lydia Butler, and Martha Butler. Farmer in Marshall County in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Marshall County, Subdivision 53, p. 22B-23A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 589.
Tennessee Marriage Records, Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Tennessee, Marshall County Marriages, 1836-1882, p. 65.
